comments.body: Can you assert on controller.offset? My expectation would be it is still zero?
same here. My expectation is that controller.offset changed to probable 200?

@Piinks - I've refactored this test to avoid checking the color(s) of the various slivers, and instead more explicitly check semantics labels corresponding to indexes.

This test would have failed because Container no longer creates a BoxDecoration in this case. Other approaches would include:

- Explicitly passing a decoration to the container we create in this test
- Using Keys - probably bad because it could affect ordering of the list, but this test doesn't seemto need that
- Refactor the test to use text widgets inside the slivers, which seemed more invasive.
Sgtm! Thanks for updating the test!
